item.crowningglory.diamond_crown.tooltip: This coronet, made of solid diamond,
is stronger than it might seem.
item.crowningglory.floral_crown.tooltip_: You can feel the call of nature while
item.crowningglory.floral_crown.moreinfo: Sneaking will prompt flowers to grow
around you in a circle. These flowers
are random each time you sneak.
item.crowningglory.frost_crown.tooltip_1: The chill of this circlet gives you
item.crowningglory.frost_crown.tooltip_2: a certain confidence. You're sure that
item.crowningglory.frost_crown.tooltip_3: you could even walk on water.
Wearing this circlet allows you to
walk across water and lava turning
them into ice and crying obsidian
item.crowningglory.wreath_crown.tooltip_: While wearing this crown you are certain
that you are gifted with a verdant mind.
No plant can resist growing for you.
item.crowningglory.wreath_crown.moreinfo: While wearing this circlet you can
sneak to make all growable plants
